snippet.textDisplay:
Proud of Fauci for not doing the whole "pretend that young people are a serious risk group in order to scare them into doing social distancing" thing that many officials have been doing (like officials who try to scare young people off of pot by describing it as though it's heroin). Not so proud of him for conflating the IFR of typical seasonal influenzas with COVID-19 CFRs . Even the hyperbolic Neil Ferguson has significantly lowered his IFR estimates recently as it's become increasingly clear that the disease is far more common in the general population than is represented in terms of caught "cases" in the CFR figures.

Iceland has the highest rate of testing per-capita among any fully independent country (although the Faroe Islands are higher). It's also the home to a random sampling study by deCODE / Íslenska Erfðagreining of the general public. Despite being a world leader in testing (the more you test, the more cases you find; Iceland tests 85 times more people per capita than the US), the random sampling study shows that the disease is nonetheless three times higher in the general public than in detected cases. Iceland has 1086 diagnoses; 3x higher would be over 3000. Deaths: 2. IFR=0,06%. Now, this is non-time-adjusted IFR (~18d mean time from infection to death), but then again, the deCODE numbers show an R ~= 1, so time-adjusted should have proportionally little impact. And yes, the denominator is low, introducing statistical random noise, but then again, we're "lucky" we even have two deaths to go on - one of them was an already well-infected tourist who just happened to die while he was here.

One doesn't have to just look at Iceland to see how common the disease is in the general public (and thus how low the IFR is). For example, several Italian towns have now been random sampled now, and show the same trends - actual infection rates way above case rates. Claiming a notion of a 1% IFR might have been a viable claim a month ago, but we're well past that now.

Didn't we learn our lesson in the 2009 H1N1 panic about overinterpreting CFRs as being representative of IFRs by underestimating how widely the disease has spread?

Also: when doing influenza vs. COVID-19 mortality comparisons, it's a bit misleading to not mention that some reasonable fraction (perhaps as high as 1/2 to 2/3rds) of those who die are those who otherwise would have died later this year; severe comorbodities are exceedingly high among those who die of the disease. That's not to say that those extra months with their loved ones would not have been meaningful. But influenza deaths are not as biased toward the already-ill, and so using a metric which leaves out the age distribution of the victims does not accurately represent the cost.
snippet.textOriginal:
Proud of Fauci for not doing the whole "pretend that young people are a serious risk group in order to scare them into doing social distancing" thing that many officials have been doing (like officials who try to scare young people off of pot by describing it as though it's heroin).  Not so proud of him for conflating the IFR of typical seasonal influenzas with COVID-19 *CFRs* .  Even the hyperbolic Neil Ferguson has significantly lowered his IFR estimates recently as it's become increasingly clear that the disease is far more common in the general population than is represented in terms of caught "cases" in the CFR figures.

Iceland has the highest rate of testing per-capita among any fully independent country (although the Faroe Islands are higher).  It's also the home to a random sampling study by deCODE / Íslenska Erfðagreining of the general public. Despite being a world leader in testing (the more you test, the more cases you find; Iceland tests 85 times more people per capita than the US), the random sampling study shows that the disease is *nonetheless* three times higher in the general public than in detected cases. Iceland has 1086 diagnoses; 3x higher would be over 3000.  Deaths: 2.  IFR=0,06%. Now, this is non-time-adjusted IFR (~18d mean time from infection to death), but then again, the deCODE numbers show an R ~= 1, so time-adjusted should have proportionally little impact.  And yes, the denominator is low, introducing statistical random noise, but then again, we're "lucky" we even have two deaths to go on - one of them was an already well-infected tourist who just happened to die while he was here.  

One doesn't have to just look at Iceland to see how common the disease is in the general public (and thus how low the IFR is).  For example, several Italian towns have now been random sampled now, and show the same trends - actual infection rates *way* above case rates.  Claiming a notion of a 1% IFR might have been a viable claim a month ago, but we're well past that now.

Didn't we learn our lesson in the 2009 H1N1 panic about overinterpreting CFRs as being representative of IFRs by underestimating how widely the disease has spread?

Also: when doing influenza vs. COVID-19 mortality comparisons, it's a bit misleading to not mention that some reasonable fraction (perhaps as high as 1/2 to 2/3rds) of those who die are those who otherwise would have died later this year; severe comorbodities are exceedingly high among those who die of the disease.  That's not to say that those extra months with their loved ones would not have been meaningful. But influenza deaths are not *as* biased toward the already-ill, and so using a metric which leaves out the age distribution of the victims does not accurately represent the cost.

Crazy times are upon us. There’s no denying it. Jesus Christ could very well crack the sky open and return quite soon. Our only recourse is to recognize our need for HIM, REPENT (turn from our own thinking/mindset/ways), and SEEK GOD alone in His Word and prayer. Only HE can wake us up and reveal to us accurately the condition of our own heart, and the season we’re in as a nation/world.

“Is there anything I need to get right with God?”

This should be at the forefront of our minds right now. Let’s ASK the LORD to show us anything we need to deal with, and TRUST Him to show us. He promises we’ll find Him IF/WHEN we seek Him with our WHOLE HEART. We must do that, now!

God is a righteous God!

SIN CANNOT AND WILL NOT ENTER HIS KINGDOM!
WE MUST REPENT NOW BEFORE IT’S TOO LATE!
HE’S STILL GIVING US TIME!!

Behold, the LORD’s hand is not shortened, that it cannot save, or His ear dull, that it cannot hear, but your iniquities have made a separation between you and your God, and your sins have hidden His face from you so that He does not hear. (Isaiah 59:1-2)

(We do not REPENT to a priest or fellow man. There is only one Mediator between God and man - the LORD Jesus Christ. He broke open the Holy of Holies when He died on the cross. We REPENT directly to our Father God!)

Seek the LORD while He may be found, call upon Him while He is near. Let the wicked forsake his way, and the unrighteous man his thoughts; let him return to the LORD, and He will have mercy on him; and to our God, for He will abundantly pardon. “For My thoughts are not your thoughts, nor are your ways My ways,” says the LORD. “For as the heavens are higher than the earth, so are My ways higher than your ways, and My thoughts than your thoughts.”
(Isaiah 55:6-9)

“YOU MUST BE BORN AGAIN!”

Jesus answered and said to him, “Most assuredly, I say to you, unless one is born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.” Nicodemus said to Him, “How can a man be born when he is old? Can he enter a second time into his mother’s womb and be born?” Jesus answered, “Most assuredly, I say to you, unless one is born of water and the Spirit, he cannot enter the kingdom of God. That which is born of the flesh is flesh, and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit. Do not marvel that I said to you, ‘You must be born again.’ The wind blows where it wishes, and you hear the sound of it, but cannot tell where it comes from and where it goes. So is everyone who is born of the Spirit.” (John 3:3-7)

Now when they heard this, they were cut to the heart, and said to Peter and the rest of the apostles, “Men and brethren, what shall we do?” Then Peter said to them, “Repent, and let every one of you be baptized in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins; and you shall receive the gift of the Holy Spirit. For the promise is to you and to your children, and to all who are afar off, as many as the Lord our God will call.” (Acts 2:37-38)

1. Repent from your sins =
Turn completely from your own ways

2. Be baptized in water in the name of Jesus Christ
(after repentance) = Understanding that the old you is
DYING WITH CHRIST, and that you are RISING ANEW into
a completely new life, to be lived as Christ determines from
now on!
Old things are PASSED AWAY –
BEHOLD ALL THINGS HAVE BECOME NEW!

3. Be filled with the Holy Spirit of God =
This is not a “feeling”, but a LIFESTYLE
of ABSOLUTE SURRENDER to Jesus Christ,
and being led moment by moment by His Holy Spirit!!

Please surrender to Jesus Christ if you haven’t already! It’s not about religion. It’s about a personal relationship with Jesus Christ.

We must cast down EVERYTHING to do with SELF and ALL false religion and tradition that perverts the truth of God’s Word in ANY WAY, and SURRENDER TO GOD, HIS WAY, as He reveals to us in His Word!

We MUST be done with ALL OTHER THINGS we’re leaning on.

We CANNOT trust in SELF or OTHERS, ONLY GOD!

Do not receive the mark of the beast!

Thus says the LORD, “Cursed is the man who trusts in man and makes flesh his strength, whose heart departs from the LORD. For he shall be like a shrub in the desert, and shall not see when good comes, but shall inhabit the parched places in the wilderness, in a salt land which is not inhabited...

Blessed is the man who trusts in the LORD, and whose hope is the LORD. For he shall be like a tree planted by the waters, which spreads out its roots by the river, and will not fear when heat comes; but its leaf will be green, and will not be anxious in the year of drought, nor will cease from yielding fruit.” (Jeremiah 17:5-8)

LET US TURN TODAY FROM ALL OTHER ‘gods’ AND ‘idols’, TO THE ONE TRUE GOD, WHO ALONE MADE HEAVEN AND EARTH AND IS WORTHY OF ALL GLORY HONOR AND PRAISE!!

Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ. We give thanks to God always for you all, making mention of you in our prayers… For our gospel did not come to you in word only, but also in power, and in the Holy Spirit and in much assurance... And you became followers of the Lord, having received the word in much affliction, with joy of the Holy Spirit... Your faith toward God has gone out… how you turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God, and to wait for His Son from heaven, whom He raised from the dead, even Jesus who delivers us from the wrath to come. (I Thessalonians 1:1b-10)

You may watch an encouraging movie on the power and love of God working through His disciples TLRmovie.com Shalom!

snippet.textDisplay: Cool story FAUCI. If your worst fear was "A respiratory illness spreading easily", why did you not buy enough supplies to be ready when this occurred???????? Did you run simulations and come up with any numbers for your worst fear. In IT, we call it LOAD TESTING.  Just like any government employee, he just sat on this information and DID NOTHING to prepare us. Gloves and N95 masks cost a few cents, all he needed was 100k-200k a year to stock on these supplies. Its time to retire. The only number I heard from you was "I advised 7 presidents". Talk with simulation numbers and not after the fact that the pandemic has already occurred. News anchors should stop playing with emotions and start caring about numbers. Its FAUCI's fault that we are not prepared.

snippet.textDisplay:
The world is so much more complex than what most of us truly understand - because nothing happens on just one plane of existence. We are all living on multiple planes - whether we are aware of it our not. Modern science is still a ways off from looking at how "contagious" emotions are and how the hype (which when you understand the energetic world would understand it is almost IMPOSSIBLE to know if this hype is really physically dangerous or just energetically/emotionally dangerous and thus making it physically dangerous) is impacting the spread and death rate. "Facts" as we think we know them...aren't as factual as we might believe. This is IN PART the era we are evolving out of believing as we understand more about the energetic world (see below or reach out to me).

Plus - we live on a planet and universe that's absolute truth is to use the life/DEATH/life cycle to balance/harmonize ALL of life. Not just human life. We as humans USED to understand this. But in the recent millennia have forgotten. So the planet is teaching us that we have become like a virus to ALL of life and are needing to be course corrected.

For those that want to understand that Health ain't just about the physical plane, or just about the spiritual plane - I have birthed a new series on my channel called "Living Healthy in the COVID19 Era". We will dive into all aspects of our MULTIDIMENSIONAL health, what Health even means (and it does NOT mean the absence of depressions, disease, viruses) and how to dance with balancing ourselves and our own inner energies with the collective energies of this planet.  

We are in a MAJOR evolutionary shift right now. Have no doubt, we are all being shifted.  We are in the birth canal if you will, being squeezed and pushed down out of the past world. How we shift is up to each one of us. Will we do it kicking and screaming, trying to hold onto the old reality of last month. Or will we do it by learning we are multidimensional beings, gaining the tools to help shift ourselves with more grace and ease.

snippet.textDisplay: I hate to say it, but some of Fauci's answers were specious at best.  "The states will solve this," is a recipe for failure.  Scattered restrictions, with transportation left in place, is a recipe for failure.  The notion that Americans will just do the right thing without enforcement is a recipe for failure.  Strict central directives from the Federal government are required, and should have been made a month ago.  To the extent that Fauci parrot's Trump's fantasy that nationwide confinement is not required, he's failing us all.  And that failure will be measured in large numbers of dead Americans, and the collapse of the health care system.
snippet.textOriginal: I hate to say it, but some of Fauci's answers were specious at best.  "The states will solve this," is a recipe for failure.  Scattered restrictions, with transportation left in place, is a recipe for failure.  The notion that Americans will just do the right thing without enforcement is a recipe for failure.  Strict central directives from the Federal government are required, and should have been made a month ago.  To the extent that Fauci parrot's Trump's fantasy that nationwide confinement is not required, he's failing us all.  And that failure will be measured in large numbers of dead Americans, and the collapse of the health care system.

snippet.textDisplay: Fauci is intentionally covering up Hydroxychloroquine's effectiveness for the drug companies.
